description:
Other Cells gather to aid when its HP becomes
half or less. Then the Pokémon changes
its form to Complete Forme.
effect:
Transforms 10% or 50% Zygarde into Complete Forme when its HP is below 50%.

This ability cannot be copied or replaced.  This ability only takes effect for Zygarde.
name: power-construct
short_effect: Transforms 10% or 50% Zygarde into Complete Forme when its HP is below 50%.
